review_title: Fantastic organisation working on a difficult problem
pros: Inspiring, clever, kind people, working on a fiercely difficult problem - corruption.
cons: You need to make sure that you seek or create development opportunities as this is an NGO without a huge development budget.

pros: Relaxed atmosphere, great team to work with
cons: Below market salaries, under resourced support functions

review_title: Great for early career, an unstable choice without opportunity for progression beyond that
pros: Friendly staff, entrepreneurial feel to programme of work
cons: Organization is a bit directionless, struggling financially. Constant anxiety amongst staff about long term job stability.

review_title: Great place to work but not great pay (UK office)
pros: Fantastic, like-minded people, a good work environment. Good work life balance. A good cause. The people definitely make the place, are smart, and have shared interests.
cons: The pay isn't great, and there is quite a high turnover.  Managers sometimes ignore issues.

pros: Wonderful team, great cause to work for, great learning curve
cons: Low pay, compared to other organisations
